Class ParseUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.felix.ipojo.parser.ParseUtils

  • public final class ParseUtils
extends Object
    Parser Utility Methods. This class contains helper method to parse iPOJO metadata.
    Author:
    Felix Project Team
